title: Farmhouse-style Sink*, Updated Cabinetry*, Package Lockers
posting_body: ['ASK ABOUT OUR CURRENT SPECIAL OFFERS!', 'Portola at SouthGlenn', '6851 South Gaylord Street, Centennial, CO, 80122', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 3', 'OR Text', '3', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Newly Renovated Apartments at the Street of SouthGlenn.', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1484 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Convenient living is yours when you rent at The Portola at Southglenn Apartments in Centennial, Colorado.', 'Situated above cafes, restaurants and designer boutiques, The Portola at Southglenn is a community of studio, one, two and three-bedroom apartment homes with newly renovated features and beautiful Mountain and Downtown views.', 'Our floorplans come in 3 unique interiors styles with renovated units featuring upgraded cabinetry, fixtures, countertops, farmhouse sinks and new wood-style flooring.', 'Features', '- Fridge with Dual Ice & Water Dispenser*', '- Solar Window Shades*', '- Washer & Dryer*', '- Light fixtures upgrades*', '- Refaced Cabinets/Cherry*', '- Oversized Tubs*', '- Balcony*', '- Brushed Nickel Fixtures*', '- Mountain Views*', '- Internet Access', '- Updated Cabinetry*', '- Farmhouse-style Sink*', '- Updated Countertops*', '*In Select Units', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness Center', '- Gated Community', '- Close', '- Package Lockers', '- Onsite Recycling', '- Dry Cleaner Service', '- Billiards/shuffle board', '- WiFi in Common Areas', '- Garage Parking', '- Clubhouse', '- Outdoor Fire Pit', '- High-end Spin Bikes', '- Spa', '- Elevators', '- Community Amenities Image', '- Storage Areas', '- Hot Tub', '- Located at the Streets of Southglenn', '- Heated Swimming Pool', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats and Dogs Allowed.', '7uVASuunxv2S']
